content: this is an easy top-down crocheted beanie using 2 strands of dk/light worsted held together one skein of each yarn will make two hats two size options are given if you would like to test-crochet this hat send me your email address by pm and i will gift you the pattern offer good until 11/25/24 pattern support and chat on my ravelry board - julie yeager designs 1 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/julie-yeager-designs
